description: Episode number 10 of Series "The Pacific century". The final program in the series looks at America's future as a "Pacific nation" by charting current economic and political trends, including the flood of Asian investment in the U.S., the domination of Asian technology and the rapid growth of Asian immigration. Through portraits of politicians, business leaders and working men and women "The Pacific century" will confront the economic, political and cultural challenges that will determine America's future in this region to which it is inextricably connected.
